turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was looking to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, I can help with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a an iced black and white mocha with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else in your order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome. which starbucks should I place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in the batch wood mall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll place the order of a venti iced black and white mocha with whole milk at the starbucks in the birchwood mall. the total will be $5.44.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order will be ready in 10 mins for pick up.
